column1:
All Resorts access: All 37 Vail North American Resorts + Andermatt-Sedrun-Disentis, Crans-Montana; partner resorts included 
on 4-day+ passes;  excludes Australia, partner resorts in Europe, Japan; each All Resorts day includes a matching bonus day 
at Afton Alps, Mt. Brighton, or Wilmot
32 Resorts access: Excludes Vail, Beaver Creek, Breck, Park City, Whistler, all partner, Europe, and Australia resorts

22 Resorts access: Excludes Vail, Beaver Creek, Breck, Keystone, Crested Butte, Park City, Heavenly, Northstar, Kirkwood, 
Stevens Pass, Stowe, Okemo, Mount Snow, Hunter, all partner, Europe, and Australia resorts
